result.eng: The course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.

result.orig: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé Sathairn
result.html: Beidh an cúrsa críochnaithe tráthnóna Dé hAoine agus beidh mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SathairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an cúrsa críoċnaiṫe tráṫnóna Dé hAoine agus beiḋ mé ag dul go dtí an t-aerfort maidin Dé SaṫairnThe course will finish Friday afternoon and I will be going to the airport Saturday morning.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.eng: You will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ga: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.orig: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.html: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidhYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú sásta a ḃeiṫ sa mbaile aríst naċ mbeiḋYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: We will be attending the wake.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag dul ag an tórramh
result.orig: Beidh muid ag dul ag an tórramh
result.html: Beidh muid ag dul ag an tórramhWe will be attending the wake.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag dul ag an tórraṁWe will be attending the wake.

result.eng: She will be working here from now on.
result.ga: Beidh sí ag obair anseo as seo amach
result.orig: Beidh sí ag obair anseo as seo amach
result.html: Beidh sí ag obair anseo as seo amachShe will be working here from now on.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sí ag obair anseo as seo amaċShe will be working here from now on.

result.eng: We will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.orig: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seo
result.html: Beidh muid ag snámh sa bhfarraige an samhradh seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige an saṁraḋ seoWe will be swimming in the sea this summer.

result.eng: We are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ga: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.orig: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hocht
result.html: Beidh muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a bheas ar siúl anocht ag a hochtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid ag súil go mór leis an seó a ḃeas ar siúl anoċt ag a hoċtWe are greatly anticipating the show that will be playing tonight at eight.

result.eng: You will be an aunt, then.
result.ga: Beidh tú i d'aintín mar sin
result.orig: Beidh tú i d'aintín mar sin
result.html: Beidh tú i d'aintín mar sinYou will be an aunt, then.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú i d'aintín mar sinYou will be an aunt, then.

result.eng: It's on Friday night, over in the hotel.
result.ga: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstán
result.orig: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstán
result.html: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstánIt's on Friday night, over in the hotel.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé ar siúl oíċe Aoine ṫiar san óstánIt's on Friday night, over in the hotel.

result.eng: Who else will be there?
result.ga: Cé eile a beidh ann
result.orig: Cé eile a beidh ann
result.html: Cé eile a beidh annWho else will be there?
result.ponchtml: Cé eile a beiḋ annWho else will be there?

result.eng: All the people of the town will be there.
result.ga: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.orig: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig ann
result.html: Beidh muintir an bhaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muintir an ḃaile uilig annAll the people of the town will be there.

result.eng: I'd love to but  I'll be working late.
result.ga: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.orig: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanach
result.html: Ba bhreá liom ach beidh mé ag obair déanachI'd love to but I'll be working late.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom aċ beiḋ mé ag obair déanaċI'd love to but I'll be working late.

result.eng: I'll be meeting some friends.
result.ga: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.orig: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.html: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag bualaḋ le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.

result.eng: I have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.orig: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.html: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanachI have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċt nó beiḋ mé deireanaċI have to go, or I'll be late.

result.eng: Goodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.orig: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.html: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárachGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Slán leat a Ṡioḃán Beiḋ mé ag caint leat amáraċGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: I will win.
result.ga: Beidh an bua agam
result.orig: Beidh an bua agam
result.html: Beidh an bua agamI will win.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an bua agamI will win.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: We'll be fine without you.
result.ga: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.orig: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasa
result.html: Beidh muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ muid go breá do d'uireasaWe'll be fine without you.

result.eng: People will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ga: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.orig: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos sé
result.html: Beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ga: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.orig: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sin
result.html: Beidh iontas uirthi cad chuige a bhfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ iontas uirṫi cad ċuige a ḃfuil tú den eolas sinShe will be wondering why you want that information.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.html: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
